description:
At the law office of Hayden and Associates in Beckley, West Virginia, we are fully committed to helping you protect your rights and interests and achieve the personally favorable outcomes you deserve for the serious and sensitive legal issues affecting your life, your family and your future.

Serving Raleigh County and the entire southern region of our state, we strive to provide the highest level of advocacy and support to our clients who have legal needs involving:

  • Family law, including divorce, child custody and support, alimony, adoptions, post-decree modifications, and all other related matters
  • Criminal defense for all types of felony and misdemeanor charges, including DUI/DWI
  • Traffic law and defense for speeding tickets, reckless driving citations and other traffic-related violations
  • Personal injury claims resulting from motor vehicle accidents, coal mining accidents, medical malpractice, defective products, and other acts of negligence or wrongdoing

When you work with our law firm, you will receive direct counsel from a local attorney you can trust to provide you with the solid advice you need to make the best-informed decisions about the matters that affect your case. Our law firm's founder, attorney Gerald Hayden, has more than 15 years of legal experience. We genuinely care about helping you through your difficult and uncertain time, and we promise to always treat you with respect and dignity as we help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family.

To begin receiving the best possible representation for your legal matter, you can contact Hayden and Associates by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule an initial consultation.
